title: Tasty Black Pepper Chicken Fry Recipe
content:
Delicious juicy and crispy black pepper chicken fry which tastes amazing. You can serve it as a side or as an appetizer for any parties.

 

Black pepper chicken fry recipe

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 10 mins

Total time: 20 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

Ingredients

Boneless chicken - 500 grams cubed

Coarsely Ground Black Pepper - 1 to 2 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Lemon Juice or Vinegar - 1 tablespoon

Coriander Leaves - 2 tablespoons chopped finely

Ginger Garlic paste - 2 tablespoons

Garam Masala Powder - 1 teaspoon

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - ¼ cup

Cornflour - ¼ cup

Oil for deep frying

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients except oil.

Marinate for 30 mins to 1 hour.

Drop-in hot oil and fry till golden.

Drain and serve.

recommendations.title: Tasty Oven Baked ( Juicy Baked ) Fried Chicken Recipe
recommendations.content:
Healthy crispy fried chicken which actually tastes like fried chicken. It is healthier and is more juicer than normal ones. Serve it with a side salad and you are good to go.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
